body:
Continuation*
 character that was a angel never gave his humanity up and from that, he decided to save a world in which he could not live. Overhaul, the sequels keep making me disappointed and, in my opinion, had it ended in the first chapter it would be a fantastic story. 4/10. The art is still good but, the feelings being less and less every time, the score continues to go down.

Day 11 - Manga 256*
Still stand by my point that a sequel wasn't needed. First off all, the other girl, the one that at first died and now is alive, become even more irrelevant, had this been a story of slef improving and getting over a dead lover, she could have had a big part, the author, however, decided to make not only the consequences be the same as the first time, the girl that shouod die, died and the girl that should have died almost died too. The author just like with the first one, took back the consequences making me think that the other two chapters were useless. While she did lose her mind, her being alive made the feelings that I had on her death useless. This happening two times makes every other death not as impacting as the two would have been since now, I will think that nobody really dies, they just sleep for a while. The baby being a angel like the father was also a missed opportunity, if the baby was a human, it could have been symbolic to a angel, the male

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse

i come here to fap , not to feel

Debatably one of the best Evangelion fan doujin series around, the art is even similar to how Yoshiyuki Sadamoto's (original manga creator of Evangelion) was back in the day before he refined it, I sometimes forget that this is actually not his own work. The Re-Take series by Kimimaru is a worthy read for any Evangelion fan, even if they aren't a fan of Shinji x Asuka fan routes.
Came for the hentai, stayed for the story.
